column4: anyone have any clue why i can nslookup, ping and wget websites, but cant access them on firefox? the internet connection keeps timing out
anyone?
you may be behind a proxy, or have a proxy configured in firefox
nope, no proxy, just simple DHCP, i made sre
you sure you dont have one configured in firefox then?
pretty sure
how many network interfaces?
3 total, 2 cars and 1 integrated on mobo
might have something to do with your routing I guess. Then again, I might be talking out of my butt.
is it the same machine you are chatting from?
well, im using qwest DSL and an actiontec gateway
ive actually installed this SAME exact version of ubuntu about 6 months ago and had no problems
is it the same machine you are on right now?
yes, although im booted into XP at the moment
can you go into xchat if you go to linux?
or any other internet-y programs?
nope, the connection times out, same as the net
im truly stumped

all I can think of is to check that you have no global proxy enabled for gnoe, and no proxys for any of the apps. Then recheck your network settings and make sure your internet interface is the one marked as default there. If that doesnt work, try creating a new user and logging in to that, see if that works.
i could try that.....
thanks
